title: HEENATIGALA Tourists attraction house sale
details:
74.0 p
Ceiling and cement floor
A greenery garden with fruits,coconut and banana
Closed to heenatigala road, Unawatuna beach (3.5km) and highway entrance at dewata 4.0 km.
An ideal for a tourist villa. The foreigners villas available arround.
NB:
House inspection only prior appointment .
